marklogic.body: RTE is a bloated, inefficient and poorly managed business that we have all been Bled to pay for for too long. A timetable full of duplicate programming to UK channels and a load of copy cat ideas in the absence of any real originality or creativity. I am a sports fan and I will lose nothing if RTE loses it's sports coverage. It just duplicates coverage on UK channels which 99% of Irish people get anyway. Spending millions on showing the same sports but with an Irish commentary is a gross waste of money. RTE should be turned upside down and Banned from showing any imported programming or international sports. Turn it into a proper Irish channel showing original programming and news in the English language while it's Irish sister TG4 does the Irish stuff.
